00033 /* =-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=
00034  *   BSP (Board Support Package)
00035  *   MCU : Texas Instruments MSP430 family
00036  *   Microcontroller definition file.
00037  * =-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=
00038  */
00039 
00040 #ifndef BSP_MSP430_DEFS_H
00041 #define BSP_MSP430_DEFS_H
00042 
00043 /* ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00044  *                                          Defines
00045  * ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00046  */
00047 #define BSP_MCU_MSP430
00048 
00049 /* ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00050  *                                     Compiler Abstraction
00051  * ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00052  */
00053 
00054 /* ---------------------- IAR Compiler ---------------------- */
00055 #ifdef __IAR_SYSTEMS_ICC__
00056 #define BSP_COMPILER_IAR
00057 
00058 #if (__VER__ < 342)
00059   #error "ERROR: This IAR compiler port requires at least revision v3.42A."
00060 /*
00061  *  Compiler versions previous to v3.42A do not have the universal msp430.h include file.
00062  *  To use an earlier version of the compiler, replace the above #error statement with
00063  *  the appropriate, device specific #include statement.
00064  */
00065 #endif
00066 
00067 /* Workaround for release v3.42A - the msp430.h file did not include support for some devices */
00068 #if ((__VER__ == 342) && (__SUBVERSION__ == 'A')) && \
00069      (defined (__MSP430F1610__) || defined (__MSP430F1611__) || defined (__MSP430F1612__))
00070 #include <msp430x16x.h>
00071 #else
00072 #include <msp430.h>
00073 #endif
00074 
00075 #define __bsp_ISTATE_T__            istate_t
00076 #define __bsp_ISR_FUNCTION__(f,v)   __bsp_QUOTED_PRAGMA__(vector=v) __interrupt void f(void); \
00077                                     __bsp_QUOTED_PRAGMA__(vector=v) __interrupt void f(void)
00078 
00079 /* Initialization call provided in IAR environment before standard C-startup */
00080 #include <intrinsics.h>
00081 #define BSP_EARLY_INIT(void) __intrinsic int __low_level_init(void)
00082 
00083 /* ---------------------- Code Composer ---------------------- */
00084 #elif (defined __TI_COMPILER_VERSION__) && (defined __MSP430__)
00085 #define BSP_COMPILER_CODE_COMPOSER
00086 
00087 /* At time of 1.1.0 release, CC430 support not in msp430.h */
00088 #if (__CC430F6137__)
00089 #include <cc430x613x.h>
00090 #else
00091 #include <msp430.h>
00092 #endif
00093 
00094 #define __bsp_ISTATE_T__            unsigned short
00095 #define __bsp_ISR_FUNCTION__(f,v)   __bsp_QUOTED_PRAGMA__(vector=v) __interrupt void f(void)
00096 
00097 /* Initialization call provided in CCE environment before standard C-startup */
00098 #define BSP_EARLY_INIT(void)  int _system_pre_init(void)
00099         
00100 /* ------------------ Unrecognized Compiler ------------------ */
00101 #else
00102 #error "ERROR: Unknown compiler."
00103 #endif
00104 
00105 #if (defined BSP_COMPILER_IAR) || (defined BSP_COMPILER_CODE_COMPOSER)
00106 #include <intrinsics.h>
00107 #define __bsp_ENABLE_INTERRUPTS__()       __enable_interrupt()
00108 #define __bsp_DISABLE_INTERRUPTS__()      __disable_interrupt()
00109 #define __bsp_INTERRUPTS_ARE_ENABLED__()  (__get_SR_register() & GIE)
00110 
00111 #define __bsp_GET_ISTATE__()              __get_interrupt_state()
00112 #define __bsp_RESTORE_ISTATE__(x)         __set_interrupt_state(x)
00113 
00114 #define __bsp_QUOTED_PRAGMA__(x)          _Pragma(#x)
00115 
00116 #endif
00117 
00118 /* ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00119  *                                          Common
00120  * ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00121  */
00122 #define __bsp_LITTLE_ENDIAN__   1
00123 #define __bsp_CODE_MEMSPACE__   /* blank */
00124 #define __bsp_XDATA_MEMSPACE__  /* blank */
00125 
00126 typedef   signed char     int8_t;
00127 typedef   signed short    int16_t;
00128 typedef   signed long     int32_t;
00129 
00130 typedef   unsigned char   uint8_t;
00131 typedef   unsigned short  uint16_t;
00132 typedef   unsigned long   uint32_t;
00133 
00134 #ifndef NULL
00135 #define NULL 0
00136 #endif
00137 
00138 /**************************************************************************************************
00139  */
00140 #endif
